title: Huge fire engulfs mobile market in Peshawar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 22 (APP): A huge fire broke out in the early hours of Monday in a mobile market located in Peshawarâ€™s Saddar area, where no loss of life reported so far.
According to rescue officials, the blaze from the fourth floor of the building, quickly spread to the other floors, creating panic among the shopkeepers and customers, private news channels reported.
More than 30 fire brigade vehicles and four water bowsers are taking part in the rescue operation.
The fire is declared third-stage and being doused by the teams of the Pakistan Army, Air Force, and Cantonment
Board. Rescue 1122 teams rescued four people.
The district administration has ordered an inquiry into the incident.
